Easy Encrypt - A Simple and Efficient Text Encryption Tool for Chrome

Easy Encrypt is a Chrome extension designed for quick and secure text encryption and decryption. This tool supports a variety of encryption algorithms, allowing users to easily secure their data directly within the browser.

Main Features and Benefits

üìç Multiple Encryption Algorithms
AES, DES, Base64 encoding, and SHA-256 hashing are available to meet a range of security needs.
Simply select your desired encryption type from the dropdown menu.
üìç Easy-to-Use Interface
Simple buttons for encryption and decryption, as well as a clear output display.
A one-click copy button allows encrypted or decrypted text to be saved to the clipboard instantly.
üìç Automatic Settings Storage
Easy Encrypt remembers your last selected algorithm and secret key, allowing for quick reuse.
User settings are stored locally in Chrome for maximum convenience.
üìç Secure and Private
All encryption and decryption operations happen locally on your device, ensuring data privacy without external transmission.
No internet connection required for encryption.

Technical Features

- Uses Chrome's Storage API to securely save user preferences locally.
- ClipboardWrite permission is used to allow one-click copying of the results.
- AES, DES, Base64, and SHA-256 algorithms are implemented for reliable encryption and decryption processes.
- Secure storage of encryption settings via Chrome‚Äôs storage to ensure a seamless experience.

FAQ

Q: Can I copy encrypted results directly?
A: Yes, simply click the copy button to save your encrypted or decrypted text to the clipboard.
Q: Are my settings saved automatically?
A: Yes, the selected algorithm and secret key are saved automatically and reloaded when you open the extension again.
Q: Which encryption algorithms are supported?
A: Easy Encrypt supports AES, DES, Base64 encoding, and SHA-256 hashing.

Future Updates

- Additional encryption options
- Dark mode support
- Keyboard shortcut functionality
